name: $action
desc: Returns: Describes the action that was taken or the observation that was made that reduces/eliminates the risk associated with the identified issue.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the action that was taken or the observation that was made that reduces/eliminates the risk associated with the identified issue.

name: $date
desc: Returns: Indicates when the mitigating action was documented.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates when the mitigating action was documented.

name: $author
desc: Returns: Identifies the practitioner who determined the mitigation and takes responsibility for the mitigation step occurring.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the practitioner who determined the mitigation and takes responsibility for the mitigation step occurring.
